body_html: The change in bernoulli would either add GPU support for bernoulli_ (which might be deprecated / removed soon) or change the semantics of bernoulli. I could give it a try tomorrow (probably adding the CUDA to bernoulli_).
body_text: The change in bernoulli would either add GPU support for bernoulli_ (which might be deprecated / removed soon) or change the semantics of bernoulli. I could give it a try tomorrow (probably adding the CUDA to bernoulli_).
body: The change in `bernoulli` would either add GPU support for `bernoulli_` (which might be deprecated / removed soon) or change the semantics of `bernoulli`. I could give it a try tomorrow (probably adding the CUDA to `bernoulli_`).
